    public static class Protocol.Server
extends java.lang.Object

      • ERROR

        public static final java.lang.String ERROR
        All error messages that are send to the client. Code | Definition ---- | ----------------- 1 | notYourTurn 2 | notYourStone 3 | notEnoughStones 4 | nameExists 5 | notChallengable 6 | ChallengerRefused 7 | invalidMove [Syntax] ERROR_[errorNo]\n\n
